webpage.title: Как оформить интернет магазин юридически в Украине
webpage.description: Перед созданием интернет-магазина важно уладить все юридические вопросы. Если этого не сделать, можно по незнанию нарушить закон. Ольга Хорошайло, юрист Центра правового консалтинга, рассказала, какую форму хозяйствования выбрать, как защищать пра...

webpage.title: Юридическое оформление интернет-магазина в Украине, что необходимо знать при открытии бизнеса в интернете.
webpage.description: Учитывая ⚡️ постоянно растущее количество пользователей интернет сетей ✅ вполне логично заниматься бизнесом именно там. Создание интернет-магазина – отличный способ получить клиентов из огромного количества посетителей онлайн ресурсов. Возникает закономерный вопрос – оформление интернет-магазина.

webpage.title: Log In - Upwork
webpage.description: Log in at Upwork, the world's top freelancing website. Hire expert freelancers in the U.S. or worldwide and grow your business. Get it done with a freelancer on Upwork.

message: 1.да! 2. может все сам вести и оплачивать.3. можно, все будет вести сам и отчеты сдавать, даже если прибыль=0. 4. это торговля-нужно читать какой КВЭД, что в себя включает .Лиза-у тебя КВЭД 68.31 ( агентства недвижимости) купля/продажа недвижимости, аренда недвижимости и мы добавили 2 КВЭДА =реклама) 5.КВЭД включает вид деятельности , можно почитать на сайте минюста .Можете! -квэд это право на ведения того или иного бизнеса . Есть еще по ФОП группы (1,2,3) Он откыл фоп у него написан вид деятельности-под него нужно смотреть какие квэды. 6. А клиенты оплачивают как? скорее всего на карту?!

webpage.title: Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting
webpage.description: Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.

webpage.description: В этом руководстве вы узнаете, как легко добавить полноценную систему аутентификации приложение Django с функциями входа в систему, выхода из системы, смены пароля и сброса. Полезные статьи и заметки о Django.

webpage.title: Чек-лист: юридические аспекты при создании сайта
webpage.description: Это основные аспекты по запуску сайта. Основные аспекты по запуску сайта - оформление отношений с разработчиками, авторские права, персональные данные, хостинг и домен, финансирование и др. Если вы хотите размещать на сайте дополнительные сведения, например, фотографии и сведения о своих сотрудниках, то здесь возникают дополнительные нюансы, связанные с трудовым законодательством. Их мы рассмотрим отдельно.

webpage.title: ★ BePartner ★ - сервис поиска бизнес партеров. Площадка поиска партнеров
webpage.description: BePartner - удобная площадка для поиска партнеров по бизнесу. Сервис предоставляет возможности тем, кто имеет идеи и желание делать собственный проект и требует профессиональной мотивированной команды.

webpage.title: How to build your own Neural Network from scratch in Python
webpage.description: A beginner’s guide to understanding the inner workings of Deep Learning
webpage.author: James Loy

text.text: How to build your own Neural Network from scratch in Python
A beginner’s guide to understanding the inner workings of Deep Learning

texts.text: : When I wrote this article a year ago, I did not expect it to be

popular. Since then, this article has been viewed more than 450,000 times, with more than 30,000 claps. It has also made it to the front page of Google, and it is among the first few search results for ‘
’. Many of you have reached out to me, and I am deeply humbled by the impact of this article on your learning journey.
This article also caught the eye of the editors at Packt Publishing. Shortly after this article was published, I was offered to be the sole author of the book
Today, I am happy to share with you that my book has been published!

text.text: The book is a continuation of this article, and it covers end-to-end implementation of neural network projects in areas such as face recognition, sentiment analysis, noise removal etc. Every chapter features a unique neural network architecture, including Convolutional Neural Networks, Long Short-Term Memory Nets and Siamese Neural Networks. If you’re looking to create a strong machine learning portfolio with deep learning projects, do consider getting the book!

texts.text: You can get the book from Amazon:

As part of my personal journey to gain a better understanding of Deep Learning, I’ve decided to build a Neural Network from scratch without a deep learning library like TensorFlow. I believe that understanding the inner workings of a Neural Network is important to any aspiring Data Scientist.

text.text: This article contains what I’ve learned, and hopefully it’ll be useful for you as well!

Most introductory texts to Neural Networks brings up brain analogies when describing them. Without delving into brain analogies, I find it easier to simply describe Neural Networks as a mathematical function that maps a given input to a desired output.
Neural Networks consist of the following components

texts.text: An
An arbitrary amount of
An
A set of
and
between each layer,
A choice of
for each hidden layer,
. In this tutorial, we’ll use a Sigmoid activation function.
The diagram below shows the architecture of a 2-layer Neural Network (

text.text: note that the input layer is typically excluded when counting the number of layers in a Neural Network
Creating a Neural Network class in Python is easy.

texts.text: The output
of a simple 2-layer Neural Network is:
You might notice that in the equation above, the weights
and the biases
are the only variables that affects the output
Naturally, the right values for the weights and biases determines the strength of the predictions. The process of fine-tuning the weights and biases from the input data is known as

text.text: Each iteration of the training process consists of the following steps:

texts.text: Calculating the predicted output
, known as
Updating the weights and biases, known as

text.text: The sequential graph below illustrates the process.
As we’ve seen in the sequential graph above, feedforward is just simple calculus and for a basic 2-layer neural network, the output of the Neural Network is:
Let’s add a feedforward function in our python code to do exactly that. Note that for simplicity, we have assumed the biases to be 0.

texts.text: However, we still need a way to evaluate the “goodness” of our predictions (i.e. how far off are our predictions)? The
allows us to do exactly that.
There are many available loss functions, and the nature of our problem should dictate our choice of loss function. In this tutorial, we’ll use a simple
as our loss function.

text.text: That is, the sum-of-squares error is simply the sum of the difference between each predicted value and the actual value. The difference is squared so that we measure the absolute value of the difference.
Our goal in training is to find the best set of weights and biases that minimizes the loss function.

texts.text: Now that we’ve measured the error of our prediction (loss), we need to find a way to
the error back, and to update our weights and biases.
In order to know the appropriate amount to adjust the weights and biases by, we need to know the

text.text: derivative of the loss function with respect to the weights and biases
Recall from calculus that the derivative of a function is simply the slope of the function.

texts.text: If we have the derivative, we can simply update the weights and biases by increasing/reducing with it(refer to the diagram above). This is known as

However, we can’t directly calculate the derivative of the loss function with respect to the weights and biases because the equation of the loss function does not contain the weights and biases. Therefore, we need the
to help us calculate it.

text.text: Chain rule for calculating derivative of the loss function with respect to the weights. Note that for simplicity, we have only displayed the partial derivative assuming a 1-layer Neural Network.
Phew! That was ugly but it allows us to get what we needed — the derivative (slope) of the loss function with respect to the weights, so that we can adjust the weights accordingly.
Now that we have that, let’s add the backpropagation function into our python code.
For a deeper understanding of the application of calculus and the chain rule in backpropagation, I strongly recommend this tutorial by 3Blue1Brown.
Now that we have our complete python code for doing feedforward and backpropagation, let’s apply our Neural Network on an example and see how well it does.
Our Neural Network should learn the ideal set of weights to represent this function. Note that it isn’t exactly trivial for us to work out the weights just by inspection alone.

texts.text: Let’s train the Neural Network for 1500 iterations and see what happens. Looking at the loss per iteration graph below, we can clearly see the loss
This is consistent with the gradient descent algorithm that we’ve discussed earlier.

text.text: Let’s look at the final prediction (output) from the Neural Network after 1500 iterations.
We did it! Our feedforward and backpropagation algorithm trained the Neural Network successfully and the predictions converged on the true values.

texts.text: Note that there’s a slight difference between the predictions and the actual values. This is desirable, as it prevents
and allows the Neural Network to
better to unseen data.
Fortunately for us, our journey isn’t over. There’s still
to learn about Neural Networks and Deep Learning. For example:
What other
can we use besides the Sigmoid function?
Using a
when training the Neural Network
Using
for image classification tasks

text.text: I’ll be writing more on these topics soon, so do follow me on Medium and keep and eye out for them!
I’ve certainly learnt a lot writing my own Neural Network from scratch.

Although Deep Learning libraries such as TensorFlow and Keras makes it easy to build deep nets without fully understanding the inner workings of a Neural Network, I find that it’s beneficial for aspiring data scientist to gain a deeper understanding of Neural Networks.
This exercise has been a great investment of my time, and I hope that it’ll be useful for you as well!

Добрый вечер. Сделаем максимально просто. Для защиты курсовой мне нужен файл полностью оформленной курсовой в формате пдф . И файл либо ссылка на практическую часть. Полностью рабочую. По итогам моего прочтения ваших работ и просмотра практики я решу , либо если у меня нет никаких вопросов и или претензий , то просто оценка. Либо если же какие то вопросы появляются то я их задаю , вы отвечаете и снова же оценка.

из приказа по политеху

"... надсиланням викладачами не пізніше 16.05.2020 (для 4 курсу) та 06.06.2020 (для 1 – 3 курсів) скан-копій або фотографій відомостей обліку успішності з результатами захистів курсових робіт/проектів на електронну пошту деканату"

так что крайний срок сдачи кусачей - 6 июня
А, ещё вот тут (в 4 пункте) используется эта формула

Я попросила мальчика одного показать и стало понятнее

В общем если там полазить, понять в принципе можно
